name: Bob & Robob's Crazy Space Adventure
description:
Bob and Robob's Crazy Space Adventure is a couch co-op, symbiosis themed game. The game is set in space where Bob the human and Robob the robot are trying to defend themselves from evil pirates that are trying to destroy their ship. The ship has powerful and dangerous ingredients onboard that Bob and Robob are trying to protect from evil people that are trying to get their hands on them for evil purposes. You will learn how to craft different types of ammo to defend against different enemy attacks, while also helping each other to protect the ship by repairing damage caused on the ship and putting out fires that occur.

Bob and Robob have different strengths and weaknesses that need to be communicated to each other while playing in order to successfully ward off the attack of the space pirates and defeat them using their massive cannon. Will Bob and Robob survive or will they end up as scraps for the pirates? Only strong teamwork and big explosions will tell!

The game is co-op only so please play with a friend!


Team

Art

Rasmus Hallstensson
Willem Dahlberg Controls (keyboard)

Bob

Move: WASD
Interact: Space

Robob

Move: Arrow keys
Interact: Right Ctrl
